name: Friendly (Benjamin Brunet, FlynnEastwood)
description:
Made by

Benjamin Brunet

Antoine Flynn

Samuel

Samuel

This game is all about what you would call a failure in another game... dying. When you die you create clones of yourself which will be useful to pass the different parts of the game where weight is of importance but beware as those same clones might want to try and steal your place to get out of this temple at the end.

The control could not be easier! simple A-D to move around.

Spoiler Ahead

Thought behind the game related to the theme We thought that the idea of creating friend by failing in the first part to be really nice, and found it quite interesting to then have to kill them in the second part so they can't take your spot at the end, all in all even if the AI is clunky at best we found this experience to be quite unique and interesting. See you next year!
